com.riskgame.service

Class FortificationPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskgame.service.FortificationPhase

  • public class FortificationPhase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is dedicated for the fortification phase of the game. It takes checks the number of countries user has proceeds if it is not less than 2. Takes the fromCountry and toCountry value which identifies from where the player wishes to move army and to where. After performing requisite validation moves army of the player.
    Author:
    Shresthi Garg, Nikitha

    • Method Detail

      • startGameFortification

        public void startGameFortification(com.riskgame.model.RiskPlayer player,
                                   com.riskgame.model.GameMapGraph mapData)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        This method is called from the Startup phase when the user opts to start the fortification. It internally calls the moveArmies method once all the validation with respect to fortification are performed.
        Parameters:
        player - - The player whose turn is to do fortification.
        mapData - - GameMapGraph object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - throws Input output exception

      • moveArmies

        public void moveArmies(com.riskgame.model.Country fromCountry,
                       com.riskgame.model.Country toCountry,
                       int armiesCount)
        This method takes the values for each player from the startFortification method and does the manipulation of armies and assign the armies
        Parameters:
        fromCountry - - The country from where player want to move army
        toCountry - - The country to where player want to move army
        armiesCount - - Count of armies player wish to move
